examples.example: 经常锻炼能给我们带来很多好处。

translate.english: Regular exercise can bring us a lot of benefits.

examples.example: 阅读经典书籍会给我们带来诸多好处。

translate.english: Reading classic books will bring us many benefits.

examples.example: 多吃水果和蔬菜对身体有很多好处。

translate.english: Eating more fruits and vegetables has many benefits for the body.
